description: The Soundgarden and Audioslave front man was a defining figure of the grunge scene and one of the best rock vocalists we had.
title: 10 Amazing Vocal Performances From Soundgarden’s Chris Cornell

description: Chris Cornell, former frontman of Soundgarden and Audioslave, passed away May 17, 2017 in Detroit at the age of 52. In light of his passing, we are republishing this early feature with Soundgarden, which originally appeared in the December 1989 issue of Spin.  They're Axl's favorite band, one of the 150 or so that Ian Astbury loves and hopes to produce, and the folks Mark Lanegan of the Screaming Trees calls "four guys who wear clothes." Soundgarden are all meat and hair and ripped knees, the band most likely to succeed from the Seattle scene. Spread out on the long beige-plaid couch on the long porch of a huge, old, white house, they are drinking Budweiser and talking about what to do this evening. "So, are we gonna play tonight or not?" guitarist Kim Thayil asks. SubPop Records, which released Soundgarden's first EP Screaming Life in '87 and is the home to the grunge bands that define the Seattle scene (Mudhoney, Tad, Nirvana and the Fluid–heavy metal as played by people who
title: SPIN's 1989 Soundgarden Profile | SPIN

description: NEW YORK (AP) — Soundgarden frontman Chris Cornell will be buried Friday in Los Angeles, his attorney Kirk Pasich said Sunday. Pasich said Cornell will be buried at Hollywood Forever Cemetery in a private service. Cornell's body was transported to Los Angeles on Sunday.
title: Soundgarden frontman Cornell's funeral will be Friday in LA

author: Francis Whittaker
description: The Soundgarden and Audioslave frontman died in Detroit overnight on Wednesday.
title: This Is How The Music World Has Paid Tribute To Chris Cornell

description: The beloved Soundgarden and Audioslave frontman was found dead earlier in the day. He was 52.

author: Ashley Zlatopolsky
description: Hours before his suicide, the Soundgarden singer gave an unfocused, irritable performance.
title: Chris Cornell's final performance: Something clearly wasn’t right

description: Vicky Cornell, the wife of Soundgarden singer Chris Cornell, has issued a statement after the death of her husband.
title: Chris Cornell's wife, Vicky, breaks silence on 'best friend' husband's death, says suicide could have been triggered by anxiety medication

description: Soundgarden and Audioslave frontman Chris Cornell took his own life in a Detroit hotel room, according to the city's medical examiner.
title: Chris Cornell took his own life, autopsy reveals
